name: WP Accordion
author: sohelwpexpert

sections.description:
WP Accordion by http://paisleyfarmersmarket.ca/sohels/

This plugin will add an expand collapse accordion feature inside a post or page.

Plugin Features

  • Shortcode System
  • TinyMCE Button added for generating Shortcode.
  • Easy documentation
    & many More.

Live Preview: http://paisleyfarmersmarket.ca/sohels/my-accordions/
sections.installation:
1. Install as a regular WordPress plugin
  2. You have to use shortcode for generate accordion in post or page. Example shortcode is given below.
    [wp_accordion][wp_toggle title=”Title”]…[/wp_toggle] [wp_toggle title=”Title”]…[/wp_toggle] [wp_toggle title=”Title”]…[/wp_toggle][/wp_accordion]
